snippet.title: Growtopia Official Trailer 3
snippet.description:
Hey, Growtopia has its own official YouTube channel now!  Visit it here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNFTBaDHB4_Y8eFa8YssSMQ

Growtopia is a creative sandbox platformer MMO where you can:

* BUILD anything you can imagine -- houses, dungeons, song, artwork, puzzles, etc
* COLLABORATE with 2.5+ million other players from around the world
* PLAY mini-games - parkour, surgery, quizzes, PVP battles, races, and more
* PROTECT items using an innovative lock system which allows you to give access to friends
* PLANT seeds to grow trees
* SPLICE seeds to discover hundreds of amazing items, with new items added constantly
* TRADE items in our secure trading system
* EXPLORE a universe of over 38 million user-created worlds, all persistent and connected to each other
* COMMUNICATE using a full chat and messaging system
* EARN a single in-game currency entirely through gameplay
* See classic pixel graphics, optimized for small and large screens
* Hear the original soundtrack by Cory Mollenhour

Growtopia is a collaboration between old school indie game designers Seth A. Robinson and Mike Hommel.

Download Growtopia for free for iOS, Android, Windows & Mac here:  http://www.growtopiagame.com

Credit:

Special thanks to Hakanss & RuneSport for making this video.  Visit their channel at: https://www.youtube.com/user/GrowtopiaNoobShow

Song:  Suspended by Philip Cunningham ( http://firebrandboy.org )
